2. Law Enforcement: Local and federal law enforcement agencies monitor National Conventions to ensure that attendees are complying with local and federal laws. Law enforcement personnel are typically present at the event to respond to any incidents of violence, disorderly conduct, or other illegal activities.

3. Inspections: Local and federal government agencies also perform inspections of the event to ensure that it complies with local and federal laws and regulations. 4. Audits: The government may audit National Convention organizers to ensure that they are following laws and regulations regarding campaign finance, lobbying, and other activities.
